table_caption: ANCOVA post-hoc results for normal control (NC), amnestic MCI (aMCI) and Alzheimer's disease (AD) subjects, controlling for age, for each regional WMTI metric (n = 41).
table_foot: Note: Asterisks indicate significant omnibus ANCOVA results for each regional metric, where *p < 0.05, **p < 0.01. WMTI = white matter tract integrity, AWF = axonal water fraction, Daxon = intra-axonal diffusivity, extra-axonal axial (De,∥) and radial (De,⊥) diffusivities.
